title: shrI svAminAthAya
sahitya:
shrI svAminAthAya namastE namastE


anupallavi

 shAshvata shiva sutAya sarva dEva sahAya svAmi shaila sthitAya varadAya


caraNam   gajAmbA ramaNAya gaNapati sOdarAya guNatrayAtItAya guhyAkArAya 
ajEndra pUjitAya Ashrita phaladAya varashikhi vAhanAya guruguha svarUpAya
